alert.note: Alert for Coosa; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:26PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tallapoosa and east central Coosa Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 625 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alexander City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Dadeville, Camp Hill, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Waverly, Hillabee Creek, Eastern Lake Martin, Northern Lake Martin, Wind Creek State Park, Still Waters Resort, Highway 9 and Highway 22, Southern Lake Martin, Western Lake Martin, Fishpond, Susannah Crossing, Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area, Blue Creek Marina, Ray and Horseshoe Bend National Military Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
